title: Tether’s hidden billions with Bloomberg’s Zeke Faux + Startup Checklist E1 | E1300
description: First, Jason chats with Bloomberg reporter Zeke Faux about his latest investigative piece "Tether's $69 Billion Mystery"(1:04). Then, Jason launches our news series "Startup Checklist" (31:49) which explores the things you should do to be prepared to launch a company.
